summary: A Skyrim Icon replacement for Desktop
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t liked the Skyrim Icon in my bottom taskbar so i replaced one with a NORD warrior (well it took one from a screenshot and did a transparent background).

Installation: Just use this *.ico for the shortcut icon you want to.

Sorry for my english -

I know its nothing big but i like to share this with you :-)

as some of you maybe dont know how - right click on the shortcut then hit properities and then click on the other symbol button - search the icon where you saved it and click ok! Have fun.
author: earlcrow
